Settings.QueryText: SELECT Users.Ref, Users.DeletionMark, Users.Predefined, Users.Description, CASE WHEN Users.DeletionMark THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS PictureNumber FROM Catalog.Users AS Users WHERE Users.Internal = FALSE AND Users.DeletionMark = FALSE AND Users.Invalid = FALSE AND TRUE IN (SELECT TRUE FROM InformationRegister.UserGroupCompositions AS UserGroupCompositions WHERE UserGroupCompositions.User = Users.Ref AND UserGroupCompositions.UsersGroup = &UsersGroup)

SELECT CatalogUserGroups.Ref, CatalogUserGroups.DeletionMark, CatalogUserGroups.Predefined, CatalogUserGroups.Parent, CatalogUserGroups.Description, CASE WHEN CatalogUserGroups.DeletionMark THEN 2 ELSE 3 END AS PictureNumber FROM Catalog.UserGroups AS CatalogUserGroups
